attributes.additional_details: Please save our local park from developers . Each year a developer tries to build on our local park . As it is the only public space left in our area containing both open grass and woods it is unique and very precious to us . A lot of people use it for walks in the fresh air and jogging etc . It is an old land fill site that we have utilised . It is a very peaceful area with picnic tables and a skate ramp for the kids . Surrounded by trees .
